C

circularSearch(String, int) - Method in class datastruct.HashTable
Returns the index of the table where the searched tuple is located (or -1 if it is not there).
computeIndex(String) - Method in class datastruct.HashTable
Computes, based on the ASCII codes of the characters that make up the key, the index of the table where the Tuple will be stored (0 >= index > TAILLE).

H

HashTable - Class in datastruct
Builds the class HashTable.java (package datastruct) under Eclipse which implements a very simplified hash table (in particular, we will consider that the table has a capacity of TAILLE tuples maximum, TAILLE being a constant).
HashTable() - Constructor for class datastruct.HashTable
The constructor that must initialize the attributes
HashTable.Tuple - Class in datastruct
Inner class that represents a Tuple (key + data)
HashTableTest - Class in datastruct
Tests every method from HashTable in JUnit4
HashTableTest() - Constructor for class datastruct.HashTableTest
Default constructor, useless
ht - Variable in class datastruct.HashTableTest
The table that will contain all the tuples

I

insert(String, Object) - Method in class datastruct.HashTable
If no Tuple in the table matches the key passed as a parameter, this method inserts a new Tuple whose key (key) and data (data) are passed as parameters.
insert(String, Object) - Method in interface datastruct.Table
If no Tuple in the table matches the key passed as a parameter, this method inserts a new Tuple whose key (key) and data (data) are passed as parameters.
